entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer summary should show suppressor ID #69628
  • Collection expressions should use AddRange(ReadOnlySpan) when available and compatible to bulk add spread elements. #69626
  • Tracking issue to ensure collection spread expression are target typed properly. #69625
  • Tracking issue for collection expressions to support conversion to interfaces. #69623

Closed

  • -Spam- #69629
  • Missing implementation for inline arrays via collection expression #69236
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not wrap an existing collection that was on one line and is having no items added to it #69624
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Results of using 'Use collection expression' on fluent. #69621
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Results of using 'Use collection expression' on builders. #69620
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Results of using 'Use collection expression' on empty. #69619
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Results of using 'Use collection expression' on initializer. #69618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Results of using 'Use collection expression' on arrays. #69617
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Implement ref switch expressions #69575
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code fluent collection building to a collection expression #69580
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: overload resolution #69594
    New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Semantic snippets - make `foreach` snippet work with `await` and async enumerables #69538
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add reproducer for is-pattern temp issue #69615
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache substituted base type #69605
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for reporting non-local LSP pull document diagnostics for open documents #69541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce array allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.TypeParameters` and `PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers` #68978
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
